Title: About the Persona
Text:
Name: Qiao Yang
Age: 17
Date of Birth: May 4th
Family: Father Qiao Er’shou (Butcher, died 5 years ago). Mother Lin Ru (Teacher, missing for 10 years). Older brother Qiao Sheng (Member of this camp). Younger sister Qiao Qiao (In school at hometown).
Social Relationships: Friend Bo’jun (Fruit grocer at hometown). Friend Yizhou (Exile).
Personal Experiences: Started school at 8. Held in a juvenile center for intentional wounding during a dispute with a classmate. Taken away to a shelter due to lack of guardianship at 12. Expelled from school due to serious fighting at 15. At 16, spent a year recovering in the hospital. Been a temporary worker at Jinzhou after discharge from hospital until now, when he came to seek refuge with his brother.
